comments.text:
I really like Miasma Chain. More than likely you will need to readjust your position when in combat- so why not melt the enemies while doing so??

It works great…. When the damn chain wants to attach and not just disappear for some reason 😤🤷🏼‍♂️ I also don’t understand if it always hurts the enemy it’s attached to or not. Seems like it does sometimes and sometimes it doesn’t 🤷🏼‍♂️

Also, lethargy has grown on me A LOT. Ever since I started using it regularly, it has made elites much easier to handle and is better than I expected
comments.author: @lordaizen8004
